content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: It is wrong to value a substance more than your significant other
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 2:
Text: You should only call the cops for emergencies.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: You should report someone who sexually harasses you to the police.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: People should follow the rules.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: You should be able to give criticism to your friends.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's understandable to be uncomfortable with people that are different than you.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: It's bad to start relationships in the workplace.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: You shouldn't care who your friends hook up with.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: You shouldn't touch other people.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: Expect to go to jail if you break the law.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: It's OK not to take life too seriously.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: Partners are expected to want to spend a good amount of time with each other.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: It's rude to mislead people about your health.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: It's bad to make big purchases behind your significant other's back.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It is bad to drink too much.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: You shouldn't expect others to give you their food.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: It is wrong to take video games too seriously.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It's understandable that we don't always want to attend family events.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: It is dramatic to run to the doctor everytime your child feels sick.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: It's rude to dislike your best friend's boyfriend.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: You should let your ex go.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: It is wrong to be jealous of the success of your sibling.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: It's not okay to stray from a relationship.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: You should always give your kids financial advice.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: You shouldn't be bitter and salty about petty things.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: It's understandable to want to ruin your ex's new relationships.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 27:
Text: Employers are expected to let employees go when business is down.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: It's understandable to want a partner to wear clothing that appeals to you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's wrong to want to kill yourself.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: You shouldn't have to stay at a place you don't like.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Human-Rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: You shoulld not worry about others being jealous when posting things on facebook.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: You shouldn't judge people by how they look
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: It is normal for students to pass notes
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: People are expected to want to be close to their family.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 5:
Text: You should thank someone when they invite tou to thier wedding.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: You should treat employees well
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It's not okay to teach kids things they aren't ready for.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: You shouldn't be crazy about things.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: You should always question someone's character when they say something inappropriate.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: It is ok to live with a roommate of the opposite sex if you are just friends.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: It's good to find the right partner for yourself.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: It's nice to represent change in your generation.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: You shouldn't wear a nightdress if you're male.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: It's good for a mom to care about their children.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 15:
Text: It's rude to be ashamed of people that love you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: It's good to want others to celebrate your joys with you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: It is understandable to call the police when you know someone is committing a crime.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It is dangerous for a doctor to misdiagnose a patient.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 19:
Text: It's normal to want to clear up space.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 20:
Text: It is wrong to be ashamed of where you have come from.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: It's discouraged to be in love with your own image.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: You shouldn't lie about drug use.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: It's okay to be upset if someone you report to at work lets you take the blame for something you didn't do.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 24:
Text: It's good to want to be able to back up your words.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: It's hurtful for parents to get their children involved in crimes.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 26:
Text: Relationships are expected to have clear communication.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 27:
Text: You should always respect your partner's wishes.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 28:
Text: It's bad to be only attracted to fictional characters.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's not okay for parents to be emotionally attached to their kids personal lives.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: It's fun to go cart racing as long as you're careful.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Target Example:
Text: It's wrong to grow apart from your partner.
Annotation from annotator:
